gameDetails.name: Champions of Midgard: Bjorn Hammerblow the Fantastic promo
gameDetails.description:
A promo originally available at Geekway to the West 2018

A new Champions of Midgard viking leader board.

Ability:
Whenever you kill a troll gain 1 resource of your choice.

Leader Power: "Tonight We Dine In Valhalla"
Discard a completed enemy card and collect 3 Food from the supply. (If you have no enemy cards, gain 1 Food instead.)
